channel.title: Server problem! please read!
channel.description:
ive got a server ready and everything. ive tried port forwarding many many times... but still no luck, can anyone help me with getting my server online without the use of hamachi or port-forwarding? tell me how to here.. or give me the site where i can get some help on this.
Ive also heard somethinb bout dedicated servers?? whats all that about? can anyone help me use dedicated servers to host my server online?! thanks alot
Person who helps me with this will get mod/admin on my server... thanks alot guys@@![br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 14, 2008, 04:00:13 PM[/size][hr]can a Dedicated Server host my server? what is it?
